channel.title: John Day Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in John Day Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-207
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-207 in Service Creek. Use OR-207 south for Mitchell and Prineville. Use OR-19 South/OR-207 North for Spray, (John Day) Fossil (Beds) National Monument (Sheep Rock Unit), and John Day. OR-207 north joins OR-19 south to Spray.

item.title: End OR-218 East at OR-19
item.description: End OR-218 East at OR-19 in Fossil. Turn left for OR-19 north to Condon; left for OR-19 south to Spray. Continue straight on Washington St. for (Fossil) City Center.

item.title: OR-218 East Approaching OR-19
item.description: OR-218 East approaching OR-19 in Fossil.

item.title: OR-19 North at OR-207 North
item.description: OR-19 North at OR-207 north near Spray. Use OR-207 north to Hardman and Heppner. Continue north on OR-19 and south on OR-207 to Spray and Fossil. OR-207 south joins OR-19 north to Service Creek.

item.title: OR-19 North Approaching OR-207
item.description: OR-19 North approaching OR-207 north to Hardman and Heppner.

item.title: OR-19 North - Wheeler County
item.description: Entering Wheeler County on OR-19 north.

item.title: End OR-402 West at OR-19
item.description: End OR-402 West at OR-19 in Kimberly.

item.title: End OR-402 West at OR-19
item.description: End OR-402 West at OR-19 in Kimberly. Use OR-19 north for Spray and Arlington; OR-19 south for (John Day) Fossil Beds National Monument, Dayville, and John Day.

item.title: End OR-402 West at OR-19 - Kimberly
item.description: End OR-402 West at OR-19 in Kimberly.

item.title: US-26 West - Burnt River Lane
item.description: US-26 West at Burnt River Lane in Unity. Merge left for South Fork (Burnt River) Campground. Merge right for US-26 west to Prairie City and John Day.

item.title: Forest Service Road at US-26
item.description: Forest Service Road at US-26 in Grant County. Turn right for US-26 east to Unity; left for US-26 west to Austin Jct. and Prairie City.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-26 West - Vale
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-26 in downtown Vale. The US-26 shield here has been incorrectly signed using the Oregon state highway shield. So it appears to be a US-20/OR-26 junction.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching US-20
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-20 junction in Vale.

item.title: US-26 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-26 East. Distance to Brogan and Vale. The text on this sign is center aligned instead of the typical format of the place names aligned to the left and the distance aligned to the right.

item.title: US-26 East - Malheur County / Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Malheur County / Mountain Time Zone on US-26 east. Most of Oregon is in Pacific Time, except for the northern half of Malheur County and some communities in Hells Canyon.

item.title: US-26 East - Camp Creek Road
item.description: US-26 East at King Creek/East Camp Creek/Little Malheur River junction.

item.title: US-26 East - Entering Baker County
item.description: Entering Baker County on US-26 East at the summit of the Blue Mountains.

item.title: US-26 East at OR-7 - Austin Junction
item.description: US-26 East at OR-7 north to Sumpter and Baker City.

item.title: US-26 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-26 east. Distance to Prairie City and Vale.

item.title: US-26 East/US-395 South Split - John Day
item.description: US-26 East/US-395 South Split in John Day. Turn right for US-395 south; continue straight for US-26 east. US-395 north joins US-26 westbound to Mount Vernon.

item.title: US-26 East/US-395 South Split - John Day
item.description: US-26 East/US-395 Split in John Day. Turn right for US-395 south to Canyon City and Burns. Continue east on US-26 for Baker City (via OR-7), and Vale.

item.title: US-26 East - John Day
item.description: Entering John Day - Population 1735 on US-26 east.

item.title: US-26 East - South Fork John Day River
item.description: US-26 East at the South Fork John Day River bridge.

item.title: US-26 East - South Fork Road
item.description: US-26 East at South Fork (John Day River) Road in Dayville. Turn right for the South Fork John Day River and Izee.

item.title: End OR-19 South at US-26
item.description: End OR-19 South at US-26 in Grant County. Turn right for US-26 West to Mitchell and Prineville (Ochoco Highway); turn left for US-26 East to Dayville and John Day (John Day Highway).

item.title: OR-19 South - John Day Fossil Beds NM Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker to sites in John Day Fossil Beds National Monument on OR-19 South - Foree, Blue Basin, and Thomas Condon Visitors Center.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-402 Junction
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-402 east to Monument and Long Creek. Continue south on OR-19 for (John Day) Fossil Beds National Monument, Dayville, and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South - Kimberly
item.description: Entering Kimberly on OR-19 south.

item.title: OR-19 South Approaching OR-402
item.description: OR-19 South approaching OR-402 to Monument.

item.title: OR-19 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-19 south. Distance to Kimberly and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South/OR-207 North at OR-19/OR-207 Split
item.description: OR-19 South/OR-207 North at OR-19/OR-207 split. Use OR-207 North for Heppner and Hardman. Continue south on OR-19 for Kimberly, (John Day) Fossil Beds National Monument and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South/OR-207 North Approaching OR-19/OR-207 Split
item.description: OR-19 South/OR-207 North approaching OR-19/OR-207 split. Use OR-207 North for Hardman and Heppner.

item.title: OR-19 South/OR-207 North - Spray
item.description: Entering Spray on OR-19 South/OR-207 North.

item.title: OR-19 South/OR-207 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on OR-19 South/OR-207 North. Distance to Spray, Heppner (via OR-207) and John Day (via OR-19).

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-207
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-207 in Service Creek. Use OR-207 south for Mitchell and Prineville. Use OR-19 South/OR-207 North for Spray, (John Day) Fossil (Beds) National Monument (Sheep Rock Unit), and John Day. OR-207 north joins OR-19 south to Spray.

item.title: OR-19 South Approaching OR-207 - Service Creek
item.description: OR-19 South Approaching OR-207 in Service Creek,

item.title: OR-19 South - Butte Creek Pass
item.description: OR-19 South - Butte Creek Pass - Elevation 3788 Feet.

item.title: OR-19 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-19 south. Distance to Spray and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-218 West
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-218 West in Fossil. Use OR-218 west for (John Day) Fossil Bends (Clarno Unit), Antelope, and Shaniko.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-218
item.description: OR-19 south at OR-218 in Fossil

item.title: OR-19 South Approaching OR-218
item.description: OR-19 South approaching OR-218 to Antelope, Shaniko, and (John Day) Fossil Beds (Clarno Unit).

item.title: OR-19 South - 45th Parallel
item.description: 45th Parallel - Halfway Between The Equator and the North Pole on OR-19 south in Fossil.

item.title: OR-19 South - First St.
item.description: OR-19 south at First St. in Fossil. Turn left for First St. to City Center and Museum. Continue south on OR-19 for Wheeler County Medical Center.

item.title: OR-19 South - Fossil
item.description: Entering Fossil on OR-19 south. Fossil is the county seat of Wheeler County, Oregon.

item.title: OR-19 South - Cummings Hill Summit
item.description: Cummings Hill Summit on OR-19 south - Elevation 3,310 Feet.

item.title: OR-19 South - Wheeler County
item.description: Entering Wheeler County on OR-205 south. Wheeler County is the least populous county in Oregon.

item.title: OR-19 South - Quinn Road/Carter Hill Road.
item.description: OR-19 South at Quinn Road/Carter Hill Road.

item.title: OR-19 South - Mayville
item.description: Entering the community of Mayville on OR-19 south.

item.title: OR-19 South/OR-206 East at OR-19/OR-206 Split
item.description: OR-19 South/OR-206 East at OR-19/OR-206 split in Condon. Turn left for OR-206 east to Lonerock and Heppner. Merge right for OR-19 south to Fossil and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-206 - Condon
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-206 in Condon. Continue straight for OR-206 west to Wasco. Turn left for OR-19 South/OR-206 east to Fossil, Heppner, and John Day. Turn right on Main St. for the Medical Center.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-206 - Condon
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-206 in Condon. Continue straight for OR-206 west; turn left for OR-19 South/OR-206 east. OR-206 joins OR-19 south through Condon.

item.title: OR-19 South Approaching OR-206
item.description: OR-19 South approaching OR-206 in Condon.

item.title: OR-19 South - Condon
item.description: OR-19 South at Washington St./Walnut St. junction in Condon. Merge left to continue south on OR-19.

item.title: OR-19 South - Condon
item.description: Entering Condon on OR-19 south. Condon is the county seat of Gilliam County.

item.title: OR-19 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-19 south. Distance to Condon and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South - Gwendolen
item.description: Entering the community of Gwendolen on OR-19 south.

item.title: OR-19 South - Olex
item.description: Entering the community of Olex on OR-19 south. Approaching the bridge over Rock Creek.

item.title: OR-19 South - Ione/Lexington Jct.
item.description: OR-19 South approaching Ione/Lexington Jct. (Baseline Road).

item.title: OR-19 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-19 south. Distance to Condon and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South (Cottonwood St.) at Locust St.
item.description: OR-19 South (Cottonwood St.) at Locust St. in Arlington. Turn left to continue south on OR-19 for Condon and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South - Arlington
item.description: OR-19 south on Cottonwood St. in Arlington.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 137 Offramp at OR-19
item.description: I-84 East Exit 137 offramp at OR-19 in Arlington. Turn right on OR-19 south for Condon and John Day. Continue straight for access to I-84/US-30 East to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 137 Offramp at OR-19
item.description: I-84 West Exit 137 offramp at OR-19 in Arlington. Turn left on OR-19 south for Condon and John Day. Continue straight for access to I-84/US-30 West to The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 West at Exit 137 - OR-19/Arlington/Condon.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 137
item.description: I-84 West approaching Exit 137 (OR-19 South). Use OR-19 south for John Day and Fossil. The Columbia River is in the background of the photograph, as well as the windmills that dot this area of the gorge.

item.title: OR-206 East at OR-19
item.description: OR-206 east at OR-19 in Condon. Continue ahead for OR-19 north to Arlington. Turn right for OR-206 East/OR-19 South for Fossil, Heppner, and John Day. Turn left on Main St. for the Medical Center.

item.title: OR-206 West at OR-19
item.description: OR-206 west at OR-19 in Condon. OR-206 joins OR-19 through Condon. Turn left for OR-19 south to Fossil and John Day. Turn right for OR-19 north/OR-206 west to Arlington and Wasco.

item.title: US-26 East - Entering Unity
item.description: Entering Unity Oregon on US-26 east.

item.title: US-26 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-26 east to Unity and Vale.

item.title: End OR-245 West at US-26
item.description: End OR-245 West at US-26. Use US-26 west for Burns, John Day, and Prairie City. Use US-26 east for Unity, Vale and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137 - OR-19/Arlington/Condon.

item.title: US-20 East at US-26 West
item.description: US-20 east at US-26 in downtown Vale. Use US-26 west for Unity and John Day. Use Glenn St. south for Adrian and Lake Owyhee. US-20 and US-26 join eastwards into Idaho.

item.title: US-20 East Approacing US-26 West
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-26 in downtown Vale. Use US-26 west for Unity and John Day. US-20 and US-26 join eastwards into Idaho.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 137 - OR-19/Arlington/Condon

item.title: US-26 West at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 West/US-395 North at US-395 north to Long Creek and Pendleton.

item.title: US-26 West at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 West/US-395 North approaching US-395 north.

item.title: US-26 West at US-395 South
item.description: US-26 west at US-395 south to Canyon City and Burns. US-395 north joins US-26 west to Mt. Vernon.

item.title: US-26 East approaching OR-19
item.description: US-26 east approaching OR-19 junction.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching US-20
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-20 junction.

item.title: US-26 East approaching US-395 North
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-395 north to Long Creek and Pendleton, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-26 East at OR-19
item.description: US-26 east approaching OR-19 north.

item.title: US-26 East at OR-19
item.description: US-26 east at OR-19 north to Kimberly and Spray.

item.title: US-26 East at US-20 East
item.description: US-20/US-26 left turn in Vale.

item.title: US-26 East at US-20 West
item.description: US-26 east at US-20 west. US-20 east follows US-26 east from here to Mountain Home, Idaho.

item.title: US-26 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-395 north. US-395 follows US-26 east to John Day.

item.title: US-26 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 east at US-395 north to Long Creek and Pendleton, and US-26 east/US-395 south to John Day and Burns.

item.title: US-26 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-26 east. Distance to Unity, Vale, and Nyssa.

item.title: US-26 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-26 east. Distance to Ironside, Vale, and Nyssa.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching OR-245
item.description: US-26 east approaching OR-245 north in Baker County.

item.title: US-26 East at OR-245
item.description: US-26 East at OR-245 east to Hereford and Baker City. Continue east on US-26 for Unity, Vale, and Ontario.

item.title: US-26 East/US-395 Split - John Day
item.description: US-26 East/US-395 Split in John Day. Turn right for US-395 south to Canyon City and Burns. Continue east on US-26 for Prairie City, Baker City (via OR-7), and Vale.
